cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the HL7 Forward Rule

hl7ApplicationName.title: HL7 Sending Application
hl7ApplicationName.description: HL7 Sending Application and Facility name (Application|Facility) in forwarded HL7 Message. If absent, use original Sending Application and Facility from received HL7 Message.

hl7FwdApplicationName.title: HL7 Forward Application Name
hl7FwdApplicationName.description: HL7 Forward Destination Application and Facility name (Application|Facility)
